actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for payment under part A thereof (the hospital insurance benefit program) for care and treatment furnished at a central radiation therapy treatment facility.

summary.text: Provides for payment under part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act (Medicare, the hospital insurance benefit program) for care and treatment furnished at a central radiation therapy treatment facility.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for payment under part A thereof (the hospital insurance benefit program) for care and treatment furnished at a central radiation therapy treatment facility.
